forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 45. North northwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. Northwest wind 5 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the night embraces Downtown San Francisco, a tranquil clarity reigns over the landscape, with the stars peeking out like timid guests at a soirée. The temperature gently hovers around a cool 45 degrees, wrapped in the subtle caress of a north-northwest breeze whispering through the night. This serene atmosphere is promising; soon the skies will be adorned with vibrant sunlight, heralding a day set to unfold with the comforting warmth of spring.

As Friday dawns, expect a canvas painted in brilliant hues of blue, where the sun ascends without ambivalence, peeking over the horizon. The anticipated high, close to 61 degrees, will invite the city to bask in its golden embrace, though expect a slight retreat to 58 in the afternoon. The winds, mild at 5 to 10 mph, will remain friendly, offering a gentle reminder of nature’s presence. The forecast suggests a welcome absence of fog, with the foggy marine layer resting far beyond the horizon, leaving the city unmarred in its beauty.

For those stepping out, layers will prove wise—a light jacket over your favorite long-sleeved shirt will be perfect for the early chill, yielding to the sun’s embrace as the day progresses. Perhaps a stroll along the waterfront beckons, where the pale ocean sparkles beneath the sun’s gaze, or a quiet café visit amidst the bustle of city life would make for an ideal afternoon. Engage in conversations that blend with the lively atmosphere, or simply take a moment to observe the rhythm of the day unfolding.
